episodes.title: Inside Mormon Secrets - Hidden In America - S01 E02 - Documentary
episodes.description:
Explore the untold stories and hidden beliefs of Mormonism in this revealing episode. From the origins in Upstate New York to the sacred grove where Joseph Smith claimed a divine visitation, witness the journey of Mormons from humble beginnings to a global community. Discover the controversies surrounding polygamy, the secretive temple rituals, and the unique practices that shape their way of life. Follow the narratives of former missionaries, delve into the impact of polygamy, and uncover the complexities within the Mormon faith. This eye-opening exploration sheds light on the lesser-known aspects of one of America's most intriguing religions.

-------

Explore the hidden realms of America's most iconic and well-guarded subcultures. A journey from doomsday cults to biker gangs, underground fight clubs to suburban swingers, the Bosom Bar industry to drug-smuggling Mennonites. Hidden in America illuminates the deepest secrets of American society, fearlessly venturing where others dare not. With expert analysis and exclusive archival footage, this groundbreaking series unveils the enigmas of outlaw groups, peculiar sects, and forbidden subcultures, providing a unique glimpse into society's mysterious underbelly.

-------

episodes.description:

episodes.title: Andrew Cohen's Downfall - How I Created A Cult - S01 EP03 - Cult Documentary
episodes.description:
Explore the riveting journey of a spiritual community under the charismatic leadership of Andrew Cohen. Witness the highs and lows, the enlightenment pursuit, and the ultimate collapse of the organization. Unveil the complexities of spiritual transformation and the human side of the guru-student relationship in this eye-opening episode.

-------

Delve into the enigmatic world of a notorious American guru in How I Created a Cult. This compelling three-part documentary series unveils the shocking truth of psychological manipulation, financial exploitation, and relentless control exerted over devoted followers. With candid interviews from former disciples and 25 years of archival material, the show traces the descent from idealistic origins to the downfall of a global spiritual empire valued at millions. How I Created a Cult scrutinises the allure of charismatic leaders and how noble intentions can spiral into darkness under authoritarian rule. It's a profound exploration of power's corrupting influence, the perils of charismatic figures, and the high cost of surrendering all to an idea or individual.

-------

episodes.title: Religion and Sexual Abuse | Breaking the Silence | All Documentary
episodes.description:
"Breaking the Silence" is a fresh, new-look documentary film dedicated to everyone around the world who suffers quietly and in the shadows - alone, worn out, and without hope. Essentially, at its heart, this film is an intense journey deep into the mind, how it can break, and how it can heal. It is a story which very will touch many, many hearts and minds, no matter who you are or where you are in life.

Subscribe here for more full length documentaries: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFrO-dKhooOuTtix5dia2_g?sub_confirmation=1
